judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellant.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Lawrence Sager, with him Louis Sager, and Sager & Sager Associates, for appellant.
Albert H. Friedman, with him Claude B. Wagoner, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Mowrey Estate.
Argued May 5, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Lawrence Sager, with him Louis Sager, and Sager & Sager Associates, for appellant.
Albert H. Friedman, with him Claude B. Wagoner, for appellee.
January 7, 1971:
